question: Which is the first Airline in the country to be awarded scheduled commuter operator (SCO) permit under the regional connectivity scheme?
explanation: Trujet is the first airline in the country to be awarded scheduled commuter operator (SCO) permit under the Ude Desh Ka Aam Nagrik (UDAN) scheme. Hyderabad-based regional air carrier Trujet is a part of Turbo Megha Airways.
